hyperaggregate.shared package¶

Submodules¶

hyperaggregate.shared.aggregation_tree module¶

class hyperaggregate.shared.aggregation_tree.AggregationGroup(id, level, is_root_level=False)¶

Bases: object

Class representing aggregation group

Variables

  • id – The identifier of the group (Assumed this value is generated to be unique in a single aggregation tree)

  • level – The level of the aggregation tree at which the group appears

  • is_root_level – Whether the group returns at the highest level of the agregation tree

  • aggregation_actors – A list of peers appearing in the group under role aggregation actor

  • participating_nodes – A list of peers appearing in the group under role aggregation participants

class hyperaggregate.shared.aggregation_tree.AggregationTree¶

Bases: object

Class representing aggregation tree

Variables

groups – A list of aggregation groups in the tree in no specific order by default

hyperaggregate.shared.responsive_message_router module¶

class hyperaggregate.shared.responsive_message_router.ResponsiveMessageRouter(address, debug_mode)¶

Bases: hyperaggregate.netutils.abstract_message_router.AbstractMessageRouter

Implements network response functionality that is shared between client and server

register_callbacks()¶

Method that should return a dictionary of message types as keys associated with their coresponding callbacks as values

Return type

dict(MessageType, (str, object) => ())

Module contents¶

Implements functionality and model classes shared between client and server
